.. _badls:

Bristol Activities of Daily Living Scale (BADLS)
------------------------------------------------

.. include:: include_data_collection_plus_local_upgrade.rst

History and guide
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Bucks RS, Ashworth DL, Wilcock GK, Siegfried K (1996). Assessment of activities
of daily living in dementia: development of the Bristol Activities of Daily
Living Scale. Age and Ageing 25: 113–120.
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8670538

Source
~~~~~~

Bucks et al. (1996), as above.

Intellectual property rights
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Copyright position unclear. Presumed copyright © Oxford University Press.

- No copyright details in original article, in which the full scale is given.
  Asked OUP 2015-06-3; no response.

- Reproduced by others, including states (e.g. Belgium:
  http://www.health.fgov.be/internet2Prd/groups/public/%40public/%40dg1/%40acutecare/documents/ie2divers/19073273_nl.pdf).

- Presumed that reproduction is not permitted.
